text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Oh, hello, Tamtam. I just spotted Rice<n>rushing down the hall.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, she wanted to do her costume<n>fitting tonight. I already
let the dorm<n>leaders know she'll be out past<n>curfew.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: That aside though, Creek. I tried<n>followin' your advice, but...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Man is this whole wait-'n-watch<n>thing rough. This'd all be
so much<n>easier if I could help 'em.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I know the feeling. The two of<n>us will have our work
cut out for us as<n>real moms someday.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Welcome to my kingdom of the night!<n>I-I'm a vampire, and...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: What are you doing, Rice?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah! Oh, um. Well, I wanted to...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...I want to apologize in advance!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
This might be unwarranted, and it<n>might be a hassle, but still!
I really... I<n>reaaally—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Really want to help you!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: But you're not on the...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I know I'm not in the plans, and I<n>always make things
worse when I'm<n>around... but I can't bear to see you<n>
toiling away all alone!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Tonight, though, I'm not Rice! With<n>this costume, I'm a
super powerful,<n>reliable vampire!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
If you reject my help, I'll drink your<n>blood and force you to
be my friend!<n>We're doing this together, whether<n>you like
it or not!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: A costume...

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text:
Halloween is a day to dress up and<n>dare to be someone
else. You can<n>borrow the costume's power to say<n>things
you can't say yourself.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I've made far too many<n>miscalculations lately...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...If I put on a costume, could I be like<n>someone else too?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: B-Bourbon?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I am not the Mihono Bourbon you<n>know. I'm a ghost.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
In order to help clear my cached<n>regrets, I must ask you
some<n>questions.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I was entrusted with a certain<n>mission, and would like to
complete<n>the related tasks perfectly. However,<n>there is
something I do not<n>understand...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Typically, when one accepts<n>responsibility for a task, they
are<n>expected to handle said task<n>themself.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
But... what should I do if I find flaws in<n>the party's initial
task distribution?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...Is it too late to change them? Would<n>accepting aid mean
admitting failure?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Bourbon...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
There's nothing wrong with getting<n>help. Working together
will make the<n>party an even bigger success.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
But if someone offers me help,<n>doesn't that mean they've
deemed<n>me unfit to complete the task myself?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: No, not at all! Everyone knows how<n>capable you are!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
The plans were made under the<n>assumption that I would do
my own<n>work, though. If others joined me,<n>would it not
affect their schedules?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: N-not as much as it would hurt us tosee you overwork yourself. I think—no,I'm sure of it.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: But...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: No more buts, okay?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
You know, for a ghost... you're just<n>like me, trying to hide
how scared you<n>are.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: And so, I want you to hear me out. Iwant to be your friend. I want tohelp you.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
And most of all, I don't want to see<n>you stressed or
worried... I want you<n>to be happy!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Then... would you mind helping me<n>finish eating the broken<n>
jack-o'-lanterns?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'd be glad to!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I'm a pretty big eater, you know!
And finally, the day of the Halloween<n>Party arrives.

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text: Aaaah! What's that?! T-there's a<n>hand, a zombie hand!

text_block_list.name: Student B
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe... What a lovely photo! Of<n>you... and of your new
ghoul friend!

text_block_list.name: Student A
text_block_list.text: Aaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Hehe, looks like this year's party is a<n>roaring success.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
We've still got plenty of spooky<n>tricks up our sleeve! Right,
Bourbon?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Yes. Attention, prop team. I will now<n>press the switch.

text_block_list.name: Students
text_block_list.text: Okay! Ready whenever!

text_block_list.name: Fog Machine
text_block_list.text: BEEP! Pssshhhhh!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Aaaah!

text_block_list.name: Vacuum
text_block_list.text: Fssshhh...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
As demonstrated, we have plenty of<n>surprises planned to
entertain guests<n>like you.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Hehe... Everyone brainstormed them<n>together. Hehehe! I
even helped a little<n>too.

text_block_list.name: Student
text_block_list.text: Tremble...

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Oh. That girl over there is all by<n>herself...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Chomp!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Hehe... I just used my powers to turn<n>you into a vampire
like me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
How about you go turn that girl too?<n>Once you're bitten...
you can turn<n>anyone into another vampire friend!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...I bet there are a whole bunch of<n>people here who would
love to be<n>friends with you.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text:
Everyone, the changing rooms are<n>this way. Don't worry if
you didn't<n>apply for a costume—we brought all<n>kinds of
spares.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Hm, looks like there's no one left in<n>line for guidance, so
I'm gonna zip out<n>and suit up.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Oh, hey Bourbon! You got the party<n>zone lookin' real
snappy! The whole<n>dorm's been real coordinated, thanks<n>
to how hard you've been workin'.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
About that—I have something to say. I<n>know I caused you
plenty of the<n>trouble.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huh? Not this again.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...Thank you, Tamamo. I am deeply<n>grateful for all the
assistance and<n>advice you provided.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Haha, ya know what? You're cuter<n>when ya smile. And
sorry for bein' a<n>busybody. Now, I've gotta hurry and<n>get
Halloweened up.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Understood.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Happy Halloween, everyone.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I hope you all have a magical evening,<n>and that you get to
spend it "letting<n>loose" with friends.
